name: No Remorse for an Undead Horse
name_original: No Remorse for an Undead Horse
description:
Oh no! The undead horses are frolicking around your favorite cemetery, and you won't stand for it! The objective is to beat as many "undead" horses as possible within 60 seconds.  Try to get a high score!

Some background info

This is a game I made for the Game Off 2022 game jam.  The theme was "cliche" so I decided to work on the idea of "beating a dead horse".  I threw in a couple of other cliches for the attacks as well.

I have never coded a game before nor done sprite or audio work, so this was a fun way to dip my foot into the whole game-development process. I did not want to make the game too grandiose in scope and ambition so I decided to do something simple.
